name: brahmin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
US (also Brahman) a member of a group of people who hold a high social position and who are usually well educated, especially people from the northeastern states of the US: In Florida, the formal Boston Brahmin looks as out of place as a New England pine in the Everglades.
another spelling of
Brahman
More examplesFewer examplesHe was very proud of his Boston Brahmin roots.He is a dour-faced Brahmin who lacks Bill Clinton's down-home magnetism.That breach of etiquette occurred at a bastion of snooty, Brahmin manners, The Country Club in Brookline, Mass.Hollywood stars now wear Chanel as often as Boston Brahmans.
